p: Until recently few MHCI epitopes were also known, however the seminal work of Daniela Weiskopf et al. [ 106] increased the number of CD8 epitopes by over 83%, and the Immune Epitope Database and Analysis Resource (IEDB) [ 123] now has over MHCI 350 human epitopes. This, until recent scarcity of epitopes may partly explain the recent paradigm shift in CD8 correlates, driven partly by the Weiskopf group [ 105].
